title: Are We All a Beth? The Dangers of Cuffing Season and My Slytherin Sis, Sally McVey
description:
This week, Lauren sits with long-time friend and semi-professional Elizabeth Holmes impersonator Sally McVey, someone who has known Lauren or "Zima" for awhile and has all the secrets.  Lauren and Sally have a friendly disagreement on how great the series Yellowstone is, Taylor Swift's iconic and longly anticipated re-release of Red and someone named Jake Gyllenhaal?? Plus, Lauren and Sally both designate the women who are killing it this week, Britney Spears and Adele, in the first dual "Chic of the Week." With such a big week in celebrity news, you can't afford to miss this episode and the rundown on ALL of it!

Watch the podcast on YouTube: https://bit.ly/ChicShitOnlyYT

Watch the podcast on IG: https://bit.ly/ChicShitOnlyIG


Don’t forget to subscribe to the podcast for free wherever you're listening or by using this link: https://bit.ly/ChicShitOnlyPodcast
